website_summaries.verdict: This jumbo-sized magnetic drawing board gives kids plenty of room to unleash their inner artist. Comes with lots of interesting, fun extras.
pros: Drawing surface is larger than most
Comes with an extra pen, stamps, stencils, and stickers
Colorful background gives drawings a bit of "pop"
cons: No storage for stamps and other pieces

customer_reviews.title: Big!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it arrived fast and the size is as noted in the description. This is definitely a big drawing board and it came with stencils and stamps. Worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: MMillare

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Works Well
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it! He is drawing lovely self portraits (see photo) and practicing his alphabet. I think the quality is just fine. It is light weight and will probably break if stepped on but it isn’t made out of steel., thus the very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's love it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this drawing board for my 3 year old and got a walking unicorn for my 5 year old but both of them loved the board more. My 5 year old spend so much time drawing on the board. The size of the board is really good and big, this is the largest size I could find and it works perfectly. My girls also love the magnetic shapes. All in all a very good toy.
customer_reviews.author: Hina Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for 3 year old Grandson!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 3 year old Grandson. It has been a wonderful toy that brings out his creativity and helps him write his name without the crayon or marker mess. He is able to draw and trace then erase and do it again. Also great for the car. Highly recommend this for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY!! NOT WORTH THE PRICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product yesterday, and I've already begun the return process. Yes, the ends of the box it came in were torn open when I received it, but this is not why I'm returning it. This product is is NOT worth the $29.99 I paid. I bought it as Christmas angel tree gift for a little girl, but it's so cheaply made, I just can't give it to her. Had I paid $10 for it, I'd consider keeping it at my house for my grandkids, but I want my money back!! It's like something you'd buy at a dollar store. I would NOT recommend this product to a friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: Lori W.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is flimsy and it's as though half the board is missing. The back is unfinished, it would be nice if there was a back piece that clipped on so the underside/backside isn't exposed. The thin edges of the board can be uncomfortable when placed on a child's lap. The board is best used on a table. Advantages: Big drawing surface, colorful surface, and shaped magnets Cons: poor quality, pen and string literally came undone the first day. I will need to find new string and tie it to the board. Not impossible, but definitely inconvenient especially after paying $20.
customer_reviews.author: BONITA F

customer_reviews.title: Color full board!
customer_reviews.text: Love this magnetic board, it’s not just regular black color board it multicolor board, as you drawing across the board the color changes.
customer_reviews.author: cindy zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great gift ~ Nice oversized drawing surface
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 3 year old Absolutely loved it! * Easy to use * Loved using the "stamp" accessories included * Slider bar easy to use to erase * Would reccomend as a gift * Nice price point @ $20.00
customer_reviews.author: ATLflightattendant

customer_reviews.title: Larger size for kids learning to write
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Largest magnetic board in the market, and good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Sue H.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, and large board for tons of fun creations! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 2 year old and it was an instant hit. It comes with 2 drawing tools, stencils, stamps, and some cute little stickers. I’m most excited about the large size of the drawing board and how lightweight it is. Having the 2 drawing tools means we can draw together with plenty of room. The stencils are fun to draw with too. And when the fun is over it swipes away easily and nothing left behind. I love how the board is colored so when you draw it’s red, green, yellow, or blue. Really makes playtime fun and helps develop your childs imagination! Love this product and will definitely be purchasing again as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Blank

customer_reviews.title: great... 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. My grand son loved it. Thank you. Joyce
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE FAYE KRUGLER

customer_reviews.title: Super fun, hours-long entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandchild several weeks ago and it now goes with us everywhere. It is Bret quality and they love the multi color ‘ink’, fun magnetic stamps, and that it’s easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyJo

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend parents to use with child.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. A lot of scribbling and stamping but a start to learning how to hold a “pencil” and be imaginative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps him constructively busy!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old loves drawing on the board and using the magnet shapes. It kept him occupied for hours when it first arrived. It’s the perfect size in my opinion. He had a small one, but he couldn’t even write his full name due to lack of space. This one is not too small or big. It’s lightweight for him to move around, too. It can be educational and creative without him noticing. I think every toddler should have this. Vendor included tips which I appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Sowhite1113

customer_reviews.title: Greasy junk
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a broken magnet and a few weird marks that looked like small burn marks. Worst of all, the entire thing (including the inside of the plastic wrapping) was covered in a greasy film of some sort. Even so, after thoroughly wiping it off, we still tried to use it. The magnets/pen did not work great, as you had to make several passes over the same area to get the colors to show up well. Returning and trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: stc2012

customer_reviews.title: It’s not black and white!
customer_reviews.text: These things have come a long way from when I was a kid. They use to be black and white now they got color! My little cousins loved it and the little ‘stickers’ it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Pretty big, cute and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty big which is good. Once you start drawing in it, the traces are still a little bit visible but it doesn’t matter when you draw over it. Imagine when you erase a drawing on a sheet of paper. How the old drawing is still a bit visible no matter how much you keep using the eraser? Well sorta of that visual but it doesn’t interfere with new drawings. Overall not bad and really big compared to the other ones. Bonus has an extra pen to draw together and a few other things. I like it. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Rise G.

customer_reviews.title: Big size and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this It came with stencils and free stickers. She loves to color with it and its mess free win win for me and her
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Cassagne

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of the large space and stamps. One of the fruit stamps came without its magnet backing so I glued it on. Also, the extra replacement pen it came with is missing the magnet at the tip. This makes me nervous because he put it in his mouth and maybe my child ate it? I hope not but i will keep a look out. ****Update. I ended up returning this item because ultimately it was flimsy and I was worried it would not last.
customer_reviews.author: K. perez

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It’s larger than most My daughter loves the rainbow colors It came with cute magnet shapes and stickers Con: The plastic frame is hollow with no bottom piece, so it feels like it would be really easy to break if stepped on or possibly if dropped. I wouldn’t buy it again just because of that- my daughter takes her magna doodle EVERYWHERE, and I don’t see this one lasting.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Large and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew for his birthday and he loved it. The two pens are perfect for him and his sister and big enough for both of them to draw together. Love that the board is colorful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! I got this for my two and a half year old and he loves it but I love it more. Takes me back to childhood. It is large enough that if your child is sweet then you can both write on it. The accessories are great! The size is perfect and it super light weight. Even my newly turned one year old can use it. It has even held up to him sitting on it which he loves to do (unfortunately). Definitely 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t very impressed with this product. It’s very cheap. The drawing doesn’t stay on it, it’s almost like the magnetic piece fall back down. I definitely feel like they add in the magnets and stencils to “make it worth the cost”. I was sad it wasn’t good quality and that it didn’t last long at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Darci

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked at how flimsy this product is. The slightest pressure bends the drawing board. The colors show up dull. Nothing about this is worth your hard earned money. I'm disappointed but can't say I'm surprised. Amazon needs to pay more attention to the vendors that sell on their platform.
customer_reviews.author: J K

customer_reviews.title: 1 and 4 year old love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is an extra large magnetic drawing board which is fun. It came with stencils but we haven’t used them because the kids are having fun with the pens and magnets. It did come with an extra pen which is a plus because the kids are always fighting over it. It’s a win for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: JoeCanAm

customer_reviews.title: A good product from a good company!
customer_reviews.text: The product was great and the customer care was great! We receive some little freebies in the package from the company that produced this and was very impressed with the quality of the board as well! My daughter loved all the magnets and the fact that it is a color version! I would definitely buy one of these again and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great if you can over look some minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Screen came with a couple scratches on it, but nothing a 2 year old would recognize. One of the magnets fell off the back of one of the stamps out of the box. Lastly, the board feels a bit flimsy, it takes a couple swipes to erase ( which my child likes), and color doesn’t show along one of the borders. The large surface to write on is great and the different colors are a nice feature. I would still recommend it; however, it is not without some issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ssaiyan91

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cheap but gets the job done. Wouldn’t have bought it if seen at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter used it once after she opened it on Christmas and it won’t erase fully.
customer_reviews.author: Casey L. Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: imagination stimulation
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is a young 3 yr old and he loved this drawing board and especially the erase feature, he was able to hold the stencils in place and trace the boat, truck, car, etc with the drawing pen making a perfect picture and was very proud. As for durability, time will tell because being just 3 he tends to want to lean on the board which could damage it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but lots of extra pieces to get lost
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic drawing board seemed like a great idea. I had one when I was a kid. While this one is perfectly functional, the shaped magnets cannot be stored on the board. It comes with tracers, which also cannot be stored with the board, and therefore will be lost within days by my toddlers. When I was a kid, all those extra tools could be stored on the board and wouldn't get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fun to draw on and saves paper!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler son loves to play with this and it gets great use. The multicolored board is fun and we don’t have issues erasing the writing or with any residual. One magnet did fall off of the larger pieces, but there are a few more left for him to play with. As a person who grew up playing with Magnadoodles, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price and productive gift !!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted it to my little cousin. She loves it. Gives a better touch than iPad because this feels more real and tactile. Best part is she gets so much joy to slide the eraser and rub out her drawings. The board is quite big which is better for her big scribblings, that said it can be easily holded in laps of a 7 year old.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Erases by itself
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's birthday and was extremely disappointed in the quality of this product. When you're drawing any kind of picture or word on here it starts disappearing by itself as you're doing it, you ultimately can't complete a picture because of this.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool, but fades way to fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son that’s 1 year & 8 months, he loves it, but the bad thing is that once you write or draw something on it, it QUICKLY fades. It’s super light weight to the point if you drop it wrong or an adult steps on it , it could break easily. Also I didn’t know when you draw or write it comes out different colors in different sections of the board. Over all it’s nice for him to play with but probably won’t last too long
customer_reviews.author: A. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheap and flimsy - not worth the money at all. I bought this for my four year for Easter and am really disappointed. The magnet pieces were already falling off the back when we opened the packaging. The magnets don’t even make the shapes they are in. The stencils are also flimsy and move all over when my daughter is trying to trace. The stickers are irrelevant to the product. Bad Amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a gift
customer_reviews.text: ***Update*** My daughter LOVES this board!!! She has spent hours sitting down and drawing on it! Even my 11 year old and 8 year old boys think it’s pretty cool! Haven’t used yet, bought for my daughters birthday. She turns 2, I’m hoping she will love it. Will try to remember to update this after she plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H

customer_reviews.title: Great classic toy, hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid toy, even though we lost most of the included addons almost instantly. But it’s still going despite rough treatment and every day use. My daughter loves it! I would be careful with the second pen after reading other reviews about the magnet coming off so we tossed that one. The attached one seems solid and we’ve had no problems. Love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly shocked at how awesome this thing is. I got a similar one from Target for $6. It’s a quarter of the size, had one pen, and the shapes didn’t work. My 3 year old played with this one for hours!! That’s saying something because I can’t get him to do anything for that long! I don’t care if it breaks in a week. It was a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Linebargers

customer_reviews.title: Won’t erase
customer_reviews.text: My son loves using these magnetic drawing pads. He wanted a bigger one to use in the car. I looked at many and this one was the biggest and came with extras such as stencils,stickers and stamps. But it has a major flaw, it’s very difficult to erase and there’s a permanent faint drawing(as you can see in picture) on the pad that prevents my son from using. I loved the bunny on it and the magnetic pen in the shape of a carrot and the size but it’s really not useable.
customer_reviews.author: Lu F.

customer_reviews.title: Great sized product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great size and had a bunch of cool additions that came with it. I also enjoyed the fact that behind the whiteboard were rainbow colors instead of just black. Only reason I took a star was because my board came with black specs on the screen and wouldn’t erase off. So now my daughter never really has a 100% clean surface to draw on.
customer_reviews.author: Tapeeuhh

customer_reviews.title: MY GREAT-NEPHEW LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift and really a good throwback to simpler toys that are not electronic.
customer_reviews.author: figuress

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy. Cheap plastic frame.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ad a gift to replace my child’s worn out name brand magnet writer. The magnet writing pad is in good shape. The larger size, magnetic color, and accessories are fun, but the plastic frame is cheaply made. I’m not sure how long it will hold up. This is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: tiffanyk

customer_reviews.title: Entertains my toddler
customer_reviews.text: This board is bigger than others that I have seen and it has a string that keeps the pen in place (which was something I was looking for, because I didn't want my kid to lose the pen). The stamps aren't the best, but a nice added bonus along with the stickers and extra pen. Also, it does not write in black, but is colorful.
customer_reviews.author: comp_g33k

customer_reviews.title: fantastic toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 months baby loves it, I love it, it's good quality, sometimes baby likes to play tough, like punch it, stand on it, scratch it, still ok to use, it's kind of toy you can play a long period of time, introduce basic painting and drawing, and mum donot need to worry about cleaning up and baby swallowing pens... worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Ying Wang

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves
customer_reviews.text: It really is a larger size. My grandson is 4 so the extras like the stencils are not necessary. I purchased two, one for each grandson. They love them. keeps them very busy for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: nancy barbieri

customer_reviews.title: Draws in rainbow! So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I would have loved this as a kid. Heck I would love to have one now. Bought this as a gift for my niece, and she loves it. Writes in a solid line, unlike older versions where you would sometimes get in complete lines due a magnetic issue. Oh and it draws in rainbow! The stamps are a big plus. Best thing is the size. It’s large, so much room to create a masterpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Ms tori

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 4 year old love the different colors. Bought for the younger one to doodle on while working with big brother on his letters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and usable just for few days pens break easily
customer_reviews.text: Not durable, great looking kids had lot of fun for few days but broken in parts over just few days of use
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj Bansal

customer_reviews.title: Ginormous to my toddler
customer_reviews.text: So big! It has an extra pen, perfect because my son's want their own pen for it :) They love the 6 different colors when they draw. I do wish it had a bit of a stronger back to it. If my child stood on it (what toddler wouldn't ;) ) I think it was snap right in the middle. Otherwise great product if your looking for something big.
customer_reviews.author: T shaner

customer_reviews.title: Totally great
customer_reviews.text: Real nice large writing surface with cool varied colors in the background. Much better than a typical etch a sketch. Also comes with a second pen which is very smart. Also the board fully erases and comes nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: MGSCOTT

customer_reviews.title: OK, not great
customer_reviews.text: The "screen" is divided into four color sections, so users can't choose to put colors where they would like. My granddaughter discovered all she needed to know about this toy in one afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Defilippo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: my kids fought over one, so I had to buy second one too. Totally worth the price. Extra pencil is so handy. Kids use that green extra pencil instead of the one attached. Kids love it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shahnoz

customer_reviews.title: Large size drawing board, perfect for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drawing board for my toddlers to learn how to color, draw, trace and write. I chose this board because of the size and is supposed to be bigger than most drawing boards and it is as it described. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy H.

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: I dont care for how there isnt a place to put the magnets after they are done being used. I didnt pay enough attention to that. I was impressed with the extra products they sent with it. That saved a star.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Binger

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves it and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old LOVES this toy and can play with it over and over again. The only comment is that I wish there was a place to store the included magnets on the pad because they can be easily lost. Otherwise, very easy to use and draw on.
customer_reviews.author: Schandly

customer_reviews.title: Extra goodies and free pen!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product. I also love the fact that I ordered it in the morning and it was shipped that same day in the evening. I bought this for my 17 month old son and he’s enjoying it! It came with a pack of extra goodies! Stickers, stencils, magnets, and an extra pen so that I can draw with my son. It’s colorful when you write or draw, which makes it seem fun to introduce colors! It’s very sturdy and it’s big! Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Arce

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is very good size drawing board for toddler to learn to write and draw. My son loves to spend time to sit down and draw now. Not like to drawing from the paper, he draw sth he doesn’t like, then easily erase it. This is a fun and learning product, came as described.
customer_reviews.author: Ming S Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Not as good
customer_reviews.text: the colors stay even after erasing, the slide thing to erase is kinda flimsy. It fairly big its not the worst one I've seen but not the best. the imperfections show after a couple of days
customer_reviews.author: ines

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: My four year old loved this but only lasted two weeks untill he took it apart . It’s big in size but the quality is cheap not like the ones they sell in stores which has lasted a few years. I threw it out since my son constantly just pulls it all apart.
customer_reviews.author: Lilah

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: 1:8 of the board fails to erase appropriately. You must swipe several times. The tip of the writing pen (the carrot) retracted into the handle (carrot), within five minutes of use. This issue has deemed it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Klimczyk

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, I tried the product before giving it to my autistic grandson, because it didn't work well at all. I wrote his name on it, and realized the magnetic pen scraped the surface due to a burr on the end of the 'pen', instead of gliding across. When I went to erase it, the image was still visible after several attempts to use the bar that erases the board. The product itself was flimsy, and very cheaply made. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Edmiston

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Our children, ages 4-10, are obsessed with it. We bought two for the youngest two kiddos, and everyone loves spending time writing notes and drawing pictures. Might have to get a couples more! It’s also fantastic for homeschooling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun for toddlers and early readers very stimulating
customer_reviews.text: This company is horrible. I would not do business with them the toy was mediocre and I returned it. They reached out to me in order for me to change my rating. I would not trust any ratings on this toy most likely be paid for it. Definitely would Not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rayelle vincent

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. I bought it for car rides but she always wants to bring it in the house to continue coloring. Only draw back was the little stamp things came unglued from a few of the magnets so i had to super glue them back on.
customer_reviews.author: Goosepie

customer_reviews.title: Its a joke, flimsy plastic, doesn't erase! Returned better than shipped Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible first it came opened. Um then first time i write 6 yries to grt it off cheap plastic break in a heartbeat. Nothing like the old school fisher price one. I would neber recommend this cheap product even the fruit isnt proper yellow strawberry. Very cheap product. Thumbs down
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ann Clark

customer_reviews.title: Toddler and Five year old loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for a 3 year old cousin for his birthday... WHen he opened it (as he has similar ones but this was a little different with stencils etc) He loved it!! The five year old cousin loved it so much his parents bought him one for Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: happy consumer

customer_reviews.title: My grand daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this. Much bigger than the average toy just like it. Which is exactly why I bought it. The multiple colors are fun. So far it is holding up very well to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: JENNY BAILEY

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: very poor quality. Kind of disappointed but my 2 year old doesn’t know the difference. It came with a bunch of moisture in the packaging but didn’t damage the item. Only cool thing is I did t realize it was colorful
customer_reviews.author: B14peeper

customer_reviews.title: Mine came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Packaging wasn't secure on the one I ordered and it arrived bent (and the magnet part looked funny) so I returned. I wasn't overly impressed with the quality for the short time I had it. But for the price , it's a good buy
customer_reviews.author: CanBMckin

customer_reviews.title: Nope, dont do it!
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned in other reviews, the board is always greasy. Not sure if it's what allows the erase function but its messy and I wouldnt want it on my toddler's hands. Some of the oil seems to have seeped into the actual board so that part of it cannot be written on. Find a similar product elsewhere without this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Our three year old loves this thing! He enjoys the magnets and stencils and even just coloring with the pen. This is a great gift idea! He spends hours using this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This will be a huge hit for our granddaughter. I like the fact it is very portable and a toy that can grow with her development.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for little one to draw around
customer_reviews.text: Bigger size for little one to draw around. The only thing is - No place to put all the stamps together and the shapes seemed are similar instead of different shapes to stamp on. Like the colors.
customer_reviews.author: H Tan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter birthday and she just turned 2, two days later it wouldn't erase and started leaking white milky stuff and broke so I had to trash it... waste of money
customer_reviews.author: destiney

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Cute activity for my 3 year old, but is a bit flimsy. You have to run the eraser track several times to clear the screen. I didn’t realize the it was multicolored, which is cute but sometimes would prefer something more like the traditional magnadoodle.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley N

customer_reviews.title: Great value and generous package but ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great buy and in fact the package was full of fun stuff not just the drawing board, which is huge too. However, very unfortunately, my 8 year old doesn't use it because the board doesn't get completely erased. Maybe he is just too picky but too bad, it is still brand-new and he is not using it. Price is great and frame quality is good, very generous to offer so much, so I hope other children don't mind too much about the board issue.
customer_reviews.author: fuz

customer_reviews.title: Great toy until the pen broke an hour into using it.🙁
customer_reviews.text: Great toy , my daughter loved playing with it for the first hour before the magnet pen broke on her😟 .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife to use it to communicate with her brother who is disabled. She is very happy, cause is very light and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old like this board. He loves the magnetic shapes and he is learning to trace. A great board with different accessories. I completly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gissela L.

customer_reviews.title: I should have ordered 2
customer_reviews.text: The perfect gift for my baby. And, the colors are bright. Something the whole family loves, day or night. Wish it had a place to put the little magnet toys. Either way, it's a great gift for little girls and little boys 🥰🥰🥰
customer_reviews.author: Shay Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it wish ink showed up a little bolder though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful purchase except it is it sturdy enough for a small child. It needs to be a little bit more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Gingermcl

customer_reviews.title: Questionable durability
customer_reviews.text: We like the size and accessories for the board. The multi colored effect is nice as well. My only concern would be if it will hold up to a young child. The middle doesn’t have any support in the back and I’m afraid my child might step on it and it would totally bust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and big screen to write on
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old daughter and she loves it. So far its been stepped on and thrown and it's holding up well. I'm really happy that the eraser is easy to glide. Other magnetic boards I've owned were kind of tough to glide the eraser across the board. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 yr old granddaughter would draw all over everything - now with this she sits for hours. She really really loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month twin granddaughters love them, I love drawing for them and doing Alphabet on them, they love erasing the pictures themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Jo V.

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: My children love this. It’s a little flimsily but I’d say worth the value. If your kids like to stand on and smash this this might not cut if for you lol 😂
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old granddaughter. She loves it! So do her older sister, 13, and brother 11. They all engage their creativeness with this toy. It is one of the best gifts I have found.
customer_reviews.author: lorrie m

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two-year-old niece and even though it says for ages three and above, we just didn’t give her the magnets. She loves scribbling on it and drawing and seeing the rainbow colors. She has stepped on it and dropped it multiple times and there’s not even so much as a dent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Gori

customer_reviews.title: Pieces. Get lost.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good board. I just wish all the pieces were attached somehow to it. My kids have already lost them.
customer_reviews.author: Kayli

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Magnetic already fell off from the stamp as soon as we open it. Another magnet fell off when we draw for about 15 mins. Very crappy material
customer_reviews.author: JCT886

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this and it is pretty strong. I try to keep the kids from standing on it and such but I still catch them every once in a while. Glad to say that it hasn't broken as of yet and I have had it for about a month
customer_reviews.author: Melanie K. Mehlberg

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Had one when I was younger. Bought it for the kids for car rides! They love it and can doodle for along time.
customer_reviews.author: KerriV

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My toddler son loves to play with this and it gets great use. The multicolored board is fun and we don’t have issues erasing the writing or with any residual. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PARIJA AJIT

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Large size, colors Cons: Cheap quality, eraser doesn’t slide without getting stuck, permanent spots and many more. I am willing to pay more and get a good quality large board.
customer_reviews.author: Po the panda

customer_reviews.title: Big and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Very big, came with colorful stickers, Stamps, stencils and an extra pen. But not sturdy as the other one I have. Does a good job though.
customer_reviews.author: Prabhakaran G.

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons love them.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size of the boards and all the stencils, extra pen and magnets that came with them. Purchased two for grandsons from the "Easter Bunny".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Learning Aid
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Christmas gift to my nephew. He is 3. He was spellbound and played for hours. Great learning aid and fun item!
customer_reviews.author: Blindref

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for non verbal
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and entertained person with dementia for hours! Not just for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Just Looking

product_meta.title: Gamenote Extra Large Magnetic Drawing Board 18×13 with Stamps & Stencils & Replacement Pen - Education Doodle Toys for Kids, Colorful Erasable Magnet Writing Sketching Pad for Toddlers Learning
feature_bullets: Big Size Board Design】The board design size 18*13inch, drawing area up to 11.5*8.5inch. This ensure that your child has a large enough area to draw(Even 2 children). The magna doodle board will helpful for your children to improve their intelligence, imagination and drawing skills

Useful Drawing Accessories: Come with 5 Fruit Stamper Magnets, 6 Plastic Stencils(6 different vehicles), 2 cute Stickers and 1 Extra Replacement Pen.These useful tools help children easy to get start and your child can have more drawing options with these. Adorable stickers help children to décor the board by themselves

More Colorful & Easy Erasable: By gently sliding the eraser, all patterns can be quickly and easily erased. 4 vivid colors (Red, Yellow, Blue, Green) in 8 color zones, making the pictures more colorful. Bright colors trigger your child’s interest and stimulates his curiosity towards colors

Materital and Safety: Made of high-quality ABS plastic, non-toxic, dust free, non-fading, no sound, no disturbance at all. Rounded edges and soft curves to eliminate potential injuries.Moreover, it helps you to also avoid oil stains on clothes when drawing with paint or ink. You can relax with a peaceful mind while your child is playing with it

Portable & Gift Package: The lightweight construction of the drawing board and its round edge handle makes it portable to carry,your kids can play and draw anywhere they want, home,classroom,park or travel. Come with solid packing box, perfect gift for Christmas, holiday, birthday

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,019 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
